sources.title: OmanX — Arrival Checklist (v1)
content: On arrival: keep passport + I-20/DS-2019 accessible.
Buy a SIM/eSIM, then set up banking and local transport.
If you are an F-1 student, contact your DSO for anything that affects status.

sources.title: OmanX — Escalation Rules (v1)
content: For legal/immigration questions, do not give definitive advice; provide official links and advise contacting the DSO/university office.
For medical emergencies: call local emergency services; do not provide medical directives.
